reuters.title: /U.S. NON-FARM PRODUCTIVITY ROSE REVISED 0.5 PCT IN 1ST QTR INSTEAD OF 1.7 PCT
reuters.body:
Bell Canada, a unit of Bell Canada Enterprises Inc <BCE>, said it applied for an average eight pct cut in Canadian long distance rates. The application to the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission would also reduce the initial period for operated-assisted calls from three minutes to one minute and operator- and customer-dialed calls would be charged the same. The billing of operator-assisted calls would include a conection charge, however. The new rate structure is similar to schedules announced by Bell January 1 for calls within Ontario, Quebec and parts of the Northwest Territories, it said.
